unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Twist!**
normalised: Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Twist!

unnormalised: Hey folks, ditch the generic reports! Follower analytics are getting a serious dose of *desi* flavor. Think beyond just follower counts - we're talking deep dives into what makes your audience in Bangalore tick.
normalised: Hey folks, ditch the generic reports! Follower analytics are getting a serious dose of desi flavor. Think beyond just follower counts - we're talking deep dives into what makes your audience in Bangalore tick.

unnormalised: Platforms are rolling out (slowly, but surely!) better tools to understand your followers' preferences, like what kind of biryani they prefer – Hyderabadi or Kolkata style? Or maybe even if they're more into Onam *sadhya* than Diwali sweets!
normalised: Platforms are rolling out (slowly, but surely!) better tools to understand your followers' preferences, like what kind of biryani they prefer – Hyderabadi or Kolkata style? Or maybe even if they're more into Onam sadhya than Diwali sweets!

unnormalised: Analyzing engagement patterns around festivals is HUGE, enabling influencers like Neha Kakkar (hopefully she sees this!) to create super relevant content.
normalised: Analyzing engagement patterns around festivals is huge, enabling influencers like Neha Kakkar (hopefully she sees this!) to create super relevant content.

unnormalised: Imagine tailoring your posts knowing 60% of your audience in Kerala loves Kathakali performances!
normalised: Imagine tailoring your posts knowing sixty percent of your audience in Kerala loves Kathakali performances!

unnormalised: Forget vanity metrics; it's all about actionable insights now. Tools like SocialPilot and even good ol' Excel (for the budget-conscious like Raju bhai) are helping.
normalised: Forget vanity metrics; it's all about actionable insights now. Tools like SocialPilot and even good ol' Excel (for the budget-conscious like Raju bhai) are helping.

unnormalised: Expect more localized sentiment analysis, pinpointing audience reactions to regional news and events. This'll help avoid PR gaffes costing Rs. lakhs.
normalised: Expect more localized sentiment analysis, pinpointing audience reactions to regional news and events. This'll help avoid P R gaffes costing rupee lakhs.

unnormalised: It's not just about likes; it's about understanding the *dil* of your Indian audience, down to the 5 km radius. Time to get analyzing!
normalised: It's not just about likes; it's about understanding the dil of your Indian audience, down to the five kilometer radius. Time to get analyzing!
